Title: The Game Is Over
Writer: Jean Cau (adaptation), Roger Vadim (adaptation), Claude Choublier (scenario collaborator), Jean Cau (dialogue), Émile Zola (novel)
Actors: Jane Fonda, Michel Piccoli, Peter McEnery, Tina Aumont
Plot: Renee Saccard is a pampered, selfish young wife of a middle-aged Parisian businessman who falls in love with her stepson but is driven to the point of madness when her husband tricks the stepson into betraying her.
